bibl.title: Gray's Elegy in a country church yard; with a translation in French verse; by L. D. To which are added, the following imitations: Nocturnal contemplations in Barham Downs Camp, Evening contemplations in a college, The nunnery, and Nightly thoughts in the Temple. With anecdotes of the life of Gray, and some remarks in French; by the editor
bibl.author: L.D. [Louis Dutens]
bibl.title: Elegie
bibl.publisher: C. & W. Townson, Kentish Courier Office
